description: Due to venue capacity, only 110 seats are available. If you missed a spot, book a private meeting with Sergiu Vasilescu, Managing Partner of VD Law Group: https://calendly.com/sergiuvasilescu/30minutes Following the success of our European editions, VD Law Group brings its flagship MiCA Regulatory Masterclass to Consensus Hong Kong. This exclusive side event is designed for founders, executives, investors, and compliance leaders operating at the intersection of Web3 and global regulation. Gain strategic legal insight into the EU s MiCA framework and its impact on licensing, market access, structuring, and cross-border operations. Categories of Crypto Asset Service Providers regulated under MiCA Custody and administration of crypto-assets on behalf of clients Operation of a crypto-asset trading platform Exchange services Execution of orders for crypto-assets on behalf of clients Placing of crypto-assets Reception and transmission of orders for crypto-asset Advisory services on crypto-assets Portfolio management on crypto-assets Categories of Tokens regulated under MiCA Asset-Referenced Tokens (ARTs) Electronic Money Tokens (EMTs) Other Crypto-Assets (including utility tokens) Limited seats available! Participation is subject to approval!
